PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title; DATELINE EUROPE
Type; Interview and Commentary
Time; 1400
No.; 13 to finish series
Origin; WNAD-Dr. Hans Schmitt
Audience; Adult
Serial Number; 57-2
Release Date; Upon arrival
We present the final thirteen programs of DATELINE EUROPE, a series of reports,
interviews, and commentaries centering primarily around the current developments
in the area of economic integration as represented by the European Coal and Steel
Community. The series deals primarily with Europe as a whole, as far as it exists,
rather than individual countries.
Three types of programs are used in the series;
1. Commentaries of Dr. Schmitt from various capitals of countries participating
in the European Coal and Steel Community or maintaining accredited missions
thereto;
2. Interviews with leading individuals who are either directly concerned with
the community or who are notably pro or anti European;
3. Reports from sites and locations which represent in some unique way the
achievements or problems of integration; places of relocation of workmen,
such as the steel producing areas of Lorraine, which have absorbed workers
from central France, where inefficient coal mines had to be closed as a
result of integration; the Saar, which has been returned to German control, etc.
The recordings are made in Europe and forwarded to WNAD where they are screened
for quality. Although the mail being what it is has caused some delay in the
forwarding of some programs, we try to get these to the stations as quickly as
possible.
